entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Quaqtaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:31 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Snow and blowing snow beginning near noon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
